hggjZ-FGGkw.title: Post Malone - Overdrive (Official Live Performance) | Vevo
hggjZ-FGGkw.description:
Post Malone - Overdrive | Vevo Official Live Performance

Post Malone was never simply one thing. His skills are as broad as his artistic vision is vast – and it’s always been that way. Listen to “White Iverson” again. That 2016 nugget was just as much a pop fever dream as it was a cornerstone of Soundcloud rap. Seems like our hero has been in perpetual evolution since day one. Connect the dots between ‘beerbongs & bentleys’ and ‘Twelve Carat Toothache’ and you’ll see a lot of territory being covered in a very logical and very compelling way. Now we’re waiting for ‘Austin,’ Posty’s latest and perhaps most revealing work to date (his real name is Austin Richard Post). It arrives July 28, and the singer has told fans that it’s “some of the most challenging and rewarding music for me, a least – trying to really push myself and really do some cool stuff.” To celebrate the arrival of his fifth full album, we united with Mr. Malone in SoCal last month. The results are stellar, with Post being deeply candid and deeply expressive for the cameras. With a fetching pop perspective, he’s leveling up once again, no doubt. Check this performance of “Overdrive,” one of the 17 songs from the new album, and stay close as we roll out more performances soon.

wkCpiFc2olE.title: Post Malone - Something Real (Official Live Performance) | Vevo
wkCpiFc2olE.description:
Post Malone - Something Real | Vevo Official Live Performance

Post Malone was never simply one thing. His skills are as broad as his artistic vision is vast – and it’s always been that way. Listen to “White Iverson” again. That 2016 nugget was just as much a pop fever dream as it was a cornerstone of Soundcloud rap. Seems like our hero has been in perpetual evolution since day one. Connect the dots between ‘beerbongs & bentleys’ and ‘Twelve Carat Toothache’ and you’ll see a lot of territory being covered in a very logical and very compelling way. Now we’re waiting for ‘Austin,’ Posty’s latest and perhaps most revealing work to date (his real name is Austin Richard Post). It arrives July 28, and the singer has told fans that it’s “some of the most challenging and rewarding music for me, a least – trying to really push myself and really do some cool stuff.” To celebrate the arrival of his fifth full album, we united with Mr. Malone in SoCal last month. The results are stellar, with Post being deeply candid and deeply expressive for the cameras. With a fetching pop perspective, he’s leveling up once again, no doubt. This OLP performance of “Something Real” is our fantastic finale. Watch through to see if Post stays up on that roof.

VzEqqSUWNjw.title: Post Malone - AUSTIN (Official Live Performances) | Vevo
VzEqqSUWNjw.description:
Post Malone - ‘AUSTIN’ Official Live Performances

Post Malone was never simply one thing. His skills are as broad as his artistic vision is vast – and it’s always been that way. Listen to “White Iverson” again. That 2016 nugget was just as much a pop fever dream as it was a cornerstone of Soundcloud rap. Seems like our hero has been in perpetual evolution since day one. Connect the dots between ‘beerbongs & bentleys’ and ‘Twelve Carat Toothache’ and you’ll see a lot of territory being covered in a very logical and very compelling way. Now we’re waiting for ‘Austin,’ Posty’s latest and perhaps most revealing work to date (his real name is Austin Richard Post). It arrives July 28, and the singer has told fans that it’s “some of the most challenging and rewarding music for me, a least – trying to really push myself and really do some cool stuff.” To celebrate the arrival of his fifth full album, we united with Mr. Malone in SoCal last month. The results are stellar, with Post being deeply candid and deeply expressive for the cameras. Geographically and emotionally, he does it all in these three performances - strumming a guitar poolside in “Green Thumb,” anguishing on the couch in “Overdrive,” and balancing on the roof in “Something Real.” Here’s to Post, here’s to Austin.

x5vTKJg69nI.title: Post Malone - Green Thumb (Official Live Performance) | Vevo
x5vTKJg69nI.description:
Post Malone - Green Thumb | Vevo Official Live Performance

Post Malone was never simply one thing. His skills are as broad as his artistic vision is vast – and it’s always been that way. Listen to “White Iverson” again. That 2016 nugget was just as much a pop fever dream as it was a cornerstone of Soundcloud rap. Seems like our hero has been in perpetual evolution since day one. Connect the dots between ‘beerbongs & bentleys’ and ‘Twelve Carat Toothache’ and you’ll see a lot of territory being covered in a very logical and very compelling way. Now we’re waiting for ‘Austin,’ Posty’s latest and perhaps most revealing work to date (his real name is Austin Richard Post). It arrives July 28, and the singer has told fans that it’s “some of the most challenging and rewarding music for me, a least – trying to really push myself and really do some cool stuff.” To celebrate the arrival of his fifth full album, we united with Mr. Malone in SoCal last month. The results are stellar, with Post being deeply candid and deeply expressive for the cameras. With a fetching pop perspective, he’s leveling up once again, no doubt. This OLP performance of "Green Thumb" joins that of “Overdrive,” one of the 17 songs from the new album, which arrives today, July 28. Stay close as we roll out more performances soon.
